fixed_skill.desc: Grant a shield to party equal to 22.8%/23.9%/25.1% of user's Attack + 690/853/1030 for 2 turns. While shielded, increase Defense by 30%.
fixed_skill.name: Snow King's Protection

innate_skill.desc: At the start of battle, increase party's Defense by 14.7% for 2 turns or until user changes Personas.
innate_skill.name: Auto-Maraku IV

innate_skill.desc: Decrease Speed by 15. Increase HP by 36%.
innate_skill.name: Ironclad Resolve IV

passive_skill.desc: Increase Defense by 37.4%. When granting a shield to an ally, either increase target's Defense by 18% or increase target's Ice damage by 10% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Tundra's Judgment

passive_skill.desc: Increase Defense by 37.4%. When granting a shield to an ally, either increase main target's Defense by 18% or Ice damage by 15% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Tundra's Judgment I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Defense by 37.4%. When granting a shield to an ally, increase main target's Defense by 18% and Ice damage by 15% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Tundra's Judgment II

passive_skill.desc: Increase Defense by 37.4%. When granting a shield to an ally, increase main target's Defense by 25% and Ice damage by 15% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Tundra's Judgment III

showtime_skill.desc: Grant a shield to party equal to 48.6%/52.0%/55.4% Attack + 1471/1854/2275 for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
